definition: all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all

sentences.english: Within three days, they were at the walls of the capital of the republic.
sentences.chinese: 三天後，他們就兵臨國都南京城下。

sentences.english: Lao tze optimum weeks, will ask ritual in Lao tze.
sentences.chinese: 孔子到周朝國都雒邑，打算向老子請教禮的知識。

sentences.english: It was a capital of the Shang dynasty and one of the earliest centers of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 它是商朝的國都和中華文明的最早中心之一。
